item.title: Applovin Stock Rises 3.1% After Key Trading Signal
item.description: Applovin stock flashed a key trading signal - a power inflow alert - at a price of $433.53, after which APP rose up to 3.1%. read more

item.title: Solar Set To Power More Than Half of New US Energy in 2025
item.description: Solar is set to deliver over half of new U.S. power capacity in 2025, driven by record growth in Texas and battery storage. read more

item.title: Warren Buffett's Tip for the Middle Class: 'Do Not Save What Is Left After Spending, but Spend What Is Left After Saving'
